job.title: Embedded Software Engineer
job.description: If you are an Embedded Software Engineer with experience please read onbrbrWhat You Will Be DoingbrbrPerform as a Software Design engineer working independently to achieve highquality software design per customer requirementsbrbrWhat You Need for this PositionbrbrMinimum Bachelors Degree in Electrical Engineering or Computer Engineeringbrbr Proficient in C programmingbrbr Proficient in System and Software Designbrbr At least 3 years of embedded software experience including the ability to work independently and participate in peer reviewsbrbr Familiarity with CMMI or ASPICE software development processbrbr Excellent communication skills including the ability to communicate technical details and document software designbrbr At least 5 years of embedded software experiencebrbr Automotive Experience with Tier1 Supplier or OEM CAN LIN Diagnosticsbrbr Experience in AUTOSAR software developmentbrbrWhats In It for YoubrbrThis position is on a contract basis for 1224 monthsbrbrSo if you are a Automotive Engineer with experience please apply todaybrbrstronguEmail Your Resume In Word TobrbrustrongLooking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you Clicking apply is the best way to apply but you may alsobrbrWendyAlvaradoCyberCoderscombrulliPlease do NOT change the email subject line in any way You must keep the USbrbrstrongCyberCoders Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity EmployerbrbrstrongAll qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion sex national origin disability protected veteran status or any other characteristic protected by lawbrbrstrongYour Right to Workstrong  In compliance with federal law all persons hired will be required to verify
